atk-s0519a3:1_1: Evaṁ uddiṭṭhe hārādayo niddisituṁ “tattha saṅkhepato”tiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:1_3: Saṅkhepato netti kittitāti samāsato nettippakaraṇaṁ kathitaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:3_0: Ettāvatā ca hetvādī, veditabbā hi viññunā.
atk-s0519a3:4_0: Tesu avisesato visesato ca hāranayānaṁ attho dassito.
atk-s0519a3:4_1: Lakkhaṇādīsu pana avisesato sabbepi hārā nayā ca yathākkamaṁ byañjanatthamukhena navaṅgassa sāsanassa atthasaṁvaṇṇanalakkhaṇā.
atk-s0519a3:4_2: Visesato pana tassa tassa hārassa nayassa ca lakkhaṇaṁ niddese eva kathayissāma.
atk-s0519a3:4_3: Kamādīni ca yasmā nesaṁ lakkhaṇesu ñātesu viññeyyāni honti,
atk-s0519a3:6_21: Taṇhāya hi kāraṇabhūtāya puggalo sukhampi sukhārammaṇampi assādeti.
atk-s0519a3:6_24: Vipallāsavasena hi sattā aniṭṭhampi ārammaṇaṁ iṭṭhākārena assādenti,
atk-s0519a3:6_25: evaṁ vedanāya sabbesaṁ tebhūmakasaṅkhārānaṁ taṇhāya vipallāsānañca assādavicāro veditabbo.
atk-s0519a3:7_11: vipallāsānaṁ sukhasaññādivasena dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatavasena ca vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a3:8_0: Ādīnavo dukkhā vedanā tissopi vā dukkhatā.
atk-s0519a3:8_1: Atha vā sabbepi tebhūmakā saṅkhārā ādīnavo.
atk-s0519a3:8_2: Ādīnaṁ ativiya kapaṇaṁ vāti pavattatīti hi ādīnavo,
atk-s0519a3:8_5: Yato tattha ādīnavānupassanā āraddhavipassakānaṁ yathābhūtanayoti vuccati.
atk-s0519a3:8_10: Tasmā ādīnavo dukkhasaccaniddesabhūtānaṁ jātiyādīnaṁ aniccatādīnaṁ dvācattālīsāya ākārānañca vasena vibhajitvā niddisitabbo.
atk-s0519a3:9_5: Tattha ariyamaggapakkhe satipaṭṭhānādīnaṁ sattattiṁsabodhipakkhiyadhammānaṁ kāyānupassanādīnañca tadantogadhabhedānaṁ
atk-s0519a3:10_0: Nibbānapakkhe pana kiñcāpi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā nippariyāyena vibhāgo natthi.
atk-s0519a3:10_3: tesaṁ paṭisambhidāmagge dassitappabhedānaṁ cakkhādīnaṁ channaṁ dvārānaṁ rūpādīnaṁ channaṁ ārammaṇānaṁ
atk-s0519a3:10_5: channaṁ dhātūnaṁ dasannaṁ kasiṇāyatanānaṁ asubhānaṁ kesādīnaṁ dvattiṁsāya ākārānaṁ pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ
atk-s0519a3:10_6: dvādasannaṁ āyatanānaṁ aṭṭhārasannaṁ dhātūnaṁ lokiyānaṁ indriyānaṁ kāmadhātuādīnaṁ tissannaṁ dhātūnaṁ
atk-s0519a3:10_7: kāmabhavādīnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ bhavānaṁ catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ appamaññānaṁ āruppānaṁ dvādasannaṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgānañcāti
atk-s0519a3:10_8: evamādīnaṁ saṅkhatadhammānaṁ nissaraṇabhāvena ca vibhajitvā niddisitabbaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:11_3: Nanu ca nibbānādhigamo bhagavato desanāya nipphādīyati.
atk-s0519a3:11_10: Yañca tasmiṁ khaṇe maggaṁ anabhisambhuṇantassa kālantare tadadhigamakāraṇabhūtaṁ sampattibhavahetu ca siyā.
atk-s0519a3:11_14: “dhammo have rakkhati dhammacārinti idaṁ phala”nti ca.
atk-s0519a3:11_15: Etena nayena devesu ca mānusesu ca āyuvaṇṇabalasukhayasaparivāraādhipateyyasampattiyo upadhisampattiyo
atk-s0519a3:11_16: cakkavattisirī devarajjasirī cattāri sampatticakkāni sīlasampadā samādhisampadā tisso vijjā cha abhiññā
atk-s0519a3:11_17: catasso paṭisambhidā sāvakabodhi paccekabodhi sammāsambodhīti sabbāpi sampattiyo puññasambhārahetukā
atk-s0519a3:12_1: Sā hi purimā purimā pacchimāya pacchimāya adhigamūpāyabhāvato paramparāya magganibbānādhigamassa ca hetubhāvato upāyo.
atk-s0519a3:12_3: Keci pana “saha vipassanāya maggo upāyo”ti vadanti,
atk-s0519a3:12_4: tesaṁ matena nissaraṇanti nibbānameva vuttaṁ siyā.
atk-s0519a3:12_5: Phalaṁ viya upāyopi pubbabhāgoti vuttaṁ siyā,
atk-s0519a3:12_8: Etthāpi pubbabhāgappaṭipadā eva udāhaṭāti sakkā viññātuṁ.
atk-s0519a3:12_9: Yasmā pana “te pahāya tare oghanti idaṁ nissaraṇa”nti ariyamaggassa nissaraṇabhāvaṁ vakkhati.
atk-s0519a3:13_0: Āṇattīti āṇārahassa bhagavato veneyyajanassa hitasiddhiyā “evaṁ paṭipajjāhī”ti vidhānaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:14_2: Desanāhāroti etesaṁ yathāvuttānaṁ assādādīnaṁ vibhajanalakkhaṇo saṁvaṇṇanāviseso desanāhāro nāmāti attho. Etthāha –
atk-s0519a3:14_3: kiṁ panetesaṁ assādādīnaṁ anavasesānaṁ vacanaṁ desanāhāro,
atk-s0519a3:14_10: Tattha anāgataṁ atthavasena niddhāretvā hāro yojetabbo.
atk-s0519a3:14_11: Ayañca attho desanāhāravibhaṅge āgamissatīti idha na papañcito.
atk-s0519a3:15_9: Etena sutte āgataṁ pucchāvissajjanaṁ vicetabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0519a3:15_10: Yā ca anugītiti vuttasseva atthassa yā anu pacchā gīti anugīti,
atk-s0519a3:15_14: Byākaraṇassa hi pucchānurūpatā idha pubbāparaṁ adhippetaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:15_18: Ettāvatā vicayahārassa visayo niravasesena dassito hoti.
atk-s0519a3:16_0: Tattha sutte sabbesaṁ padānaṁ anupubbena atthaso byañjanaso ca vicayo padavicayo.
atk-s0519a3:16_1: “Ayaṁ pucchā adiṭṭhajotanā diṭṭhasaṁsandanā vimaticchedanā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchā sattādhiṭṭhānā
atk-s0519a3:16_2: dhammādhiṭṭhānā ekādhiṭṭhānā anekādhiṭṭhānā sammutivisayā paramatthavisayā atītavisayā anāgatavisayā
atk-s0519a3:16_4: “Idaṁ vissajjanaṁ ekaṁsabyākaraṇaṁ vibhajjabyākaraṇaṁ paṭipucchābyākaraṇaṁ ṭhapanaṁ sāvasesaṁ niravasesaṁ
atk-s0519a3:17_1: etena na sametī”ti pucchitatthaṁ ānetvā vicayo pubbenāparaṁ saṁsanditvā ca vicayo pubbāparavicayo.
atk-s0519a3:17_2: “Ayaṁ anugīti vuttatthasaṅgahā avuttatthasaṅgahā tadubhayatthasaṅgahā kusalatthasaṅgahā akusalatthasaṅgahā”tiādinā anugītivicayo.
atk-s0519a3:17_6: avasiṭṭhānaṁ tebhūmakadhammānaṁ “yathāsakalakkhaṇā”tiādinā sabbesañca dvāvīsatiyā tikesu dvācattālīsādhike
atk-s0519a3:18_2: aniccatādīnaṁ ādiantavantatāya aniccantikatāya ca “aniccā”tiādinā sabbesañca lokiyadhammānaṁ saṁkilesabhāgiyahānabhāgiyatādivasena
atk-s0519a3:18_6: Phalādīnaṁ taṁtaṁsuttadesanāya sādhetabbaphalassa tadupāyassa tattha tattha suttavidhivacanassa ca vibhāganiddhāraṇavasena vicayo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a3:18_7: Evaṁ padapucchāvissajjanapubbāparānugītīnaṁ assādādīnañca visesaniddhāraṇavaseneva vicayalakkhaṇo “vicayo hāro”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0519a3:19_3: Byañjanañhi mūlapadāni viya nayānaṁ hārānaṁ bhūmi pavattiṭṭhānaṁ,
atk-s0519a3:19_14: Yuttāyuttaparikkhāti yuttassa ca ayuttassa ca upaparikkhā.
atk-s0519a3:19_19: Tattha byañjanassa tāva sabhāvaniruttibhāvo adhippetatthavācakabhāvo ca yuttabhāvo.
atk-s0519a3:19_23: Hāro yuttīti niddiṭṭhoti evaṁ sutte byañjanatthānaṁ yuttāyuttabhāvavibhāvanalakkhaṇo yuttihāroti veditabbo.
atk-s0519a3:20_4: yonisomanasikārādi sutte āgataṁ vā anāgataṁ vā sambhavato niddhāretvā kathetabbanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a3:20_7: Yāva sabbadhammāti yattakā tasmiṁ sutte āgatā dhammā,
atk-s0519a3:20_8: tesaṁ sabbesampi yathānurūpaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ niddhāretvā kathetabbanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a3:20_9: Atha vā yāva sabbadhammāti suttāgatassa dhammassa yaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ,
atk-s0519a3:20_10: tassapi yaṁ padaṭṭhānanti sambhavato yāva sabbadhammā padaṭṭhānavicāraṇā kātabbāti attho.
atk-s0519a3:20_11: Eso hāro padaṭṭhānoti evaṁ sutte āgatadhammānaṁ padaṭṭhānabhūtā dhammā tesañca padaṭṭhānabhūtāti sambhavato
atk-s0519a3:21_1: Vuttamhiekadhammeti kusalādīsu khandhādīsu vā yasmiṁ kismiñci ekadhamme,
atk-s0519a3:21_3: Ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā kecīti ye keci dhammā kusalādibhāvena rūpakkhandhādibhāvena vā tena dhammena samānalakkhaṇā.
atk-s0519a3:21_4: Vuttā bhavanti sabbeti te sabbepi kusalādisabhāvā,
atk-s0519a3:21_5: khandhādisabhāvā vā dhammā sutte avuttāpi tāya samānalakkhaṇatāya vuttā bhavanti ānetvā saṁvaṇṇanāvasenāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a3:21_7: Tena sahacāritā samānakiccatā samānahetutā samānaphalatā samānārammaṇatāti evamādīhi avuttānampi vuttānaṁ viya niddhāraṇaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:21_8: So hāro lakkhaṇo nāmāti evaṁ sutte anāgatepi dhamme vuttappakārena āgate viya niddhāretvā yā saṁvaṇṇanā,
atk-s0519a3:22_3: Adhippāyoti buddhānaṁ sāvakānaṁ vā tassa suttassa desakānaṁ adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a3:22_7: ayaṁ pana visesato byañjanadvāreneva atthapariyesanāti katvā “byañjana”nti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:22_9: “byañjanena suttassa neruttañca adhippāyo ca nidānañca pubbāparānusandhi ca gavesitabbā”ti.
atk-s0519a3:22_14: Pubbāparānusandhīti pubbena ca aparena ca anusandhi.
atk-s0519a3:22_16: suttassa pubbabhāgena aparabhāgaṁ saṁsanditvā kathananti attho.
atk-s0519a3:22_17: Saṅgītivasena vā pubbāparabhūtehi suttantarehi saṁvaṇṇiyamānassa suttassa saṁsandanaṁ pubbāparānusandhi.
atk-s0519a3:22_20: Eso hāro catubyūhoti evaṁ nibbacanādhippāyādīnaṁ catunnaṁ vibhāvanalakkhaṇo catubyūho hāro nāmāti attho.
atk-s0519a3:23_1: Ekamhi padaṭṭhāneti ekasmiṁ ārambhadhātuādike parakkamadhātuādīnaṁ padaṭṭhānabhūte dhamme desanāruḷhe sati.
atk-s0519a3:23_2: Pariyesati sesakaṁ padaṭṭhānanti tassa visabhāgatāya aggahaṇena vā sesakaṁ pamādādīnaṁ āsannakāraṇattā
atk-s0519a3:23_3: padaṭṭhānabhūtaṁ kosajjādikaṁ dhammantaraṁ pariyesati paññāya gavesati,
atk-s0519a3:23_4: pariyesitvā ca saṁvaṇṇanāya yojento desanaṁ āvaṭṭati paṭipakkheti vīriyārambhādimukhena āraddhasuttaṁ
atk-s0519a3:23_5: vuttanayena pamādādivasena niddisanto desanaṁ paṭipakkhato āvaṭṭeti nāma.
atk-s0519a3:23_6: Āvaṭṭo nāma so hāroti desanāya gahitadhammānaṁ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammavasena āvaṭṭanalakkhaṇo āvaṭṭo hāro nāmāti attho.
atk-s0519a3:24_3: Padaṭṭhānanti yasmiṁ patiṭṭhite uttari guṇavisese adhigacchati,
atk-s0519a3:24_7: Sādhāraṇeti dassanapahātabbādināmavasena vā puthujjanasotāpannādivatthuvasena vā sādhāraṇe avisiṭṭhe samāneti attho.
atk-s0519a3:24_9: Neyyo vibhattīti yathāvuttadhammādīnaṁ vibhajano ayaṁ hāro vibhattīti ñātabboti attho.
atk-s0519a3:24_10: Tasmā saṁkilesadhamme vodānadhamme ca sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇato padaṭṭhānato bhūmito ca vibhajanalakkhaṇo “vibhattihāro”ti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:25_6: Parivattati paṭipakkheti vuttānaṁ dhammānaṁ ye paṭipakkhā,
atk-s0519a3:25_8: Evaṁ niddiṭṭhānaṁ dhammānaṁ paṭipakkhato parivattanalakkhaṇo “parivattano hāro”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0519a3:26_7: Tena bahū eva pariyāyasaddā vevacanahārayojanāyaṁ kathetabbā,
atk-s0519a3:26_9: Sutte vuttānīti navavidhasuttantasaṅkhāte tepiṭake buddhavacane bhāsitāni.
atk-s0519a3:26_11: tena pāḷiyaṁ āgatāniyeva vevacanāni gahetabbānīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0519a3:26_13: Yo jānāti suttavidūti yathā “sappissa jānāhī”ti vutte “sappinā vicārehi,
atk-s0519a3:26_16: evaṁ yo suttakovido dhammakathiko ekassa atthassa bahūpi pariyāyasadde vicāreti vibhāveti yojetīti attho.
atk-s0519a3:26_17: Vevacano nāma so hāroti tassa atthassa vuttappakārapariyāyasaddayojanālakkhaṇo vevacanahāro nāma.
atk-s0519a3:27_5: So ākāroti yo ekassevatthassa nikkhepappabhavapaññattiādivasena anekāhi paññattīhi paññāpanākāro.
atk-s0519a3:27_6: Ñeyyo paññatti nāma hāroti paññattihāro nāmāti ñātabbo.
atk-s0519a3:27_7: Tasmā ekekassa dhammassa anekāhi paññattīhi paññāpetabbākāravibhāvanalakkhaṇo “paññattihāro”ti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:28_4: Etehīti yo dvādasapadiko paccayākāro yāni ca dvāvīsatindriyāni ye ca pañcakkhandhā yā ca aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo yāni ca dvādasāyatanāni,
atk-s0519a3:28_8: Otaraṇo nāma so hāroti yo yathāvutto saṁvaṇṇanāviseso,
atk-s0519a3:28_10: Ca-saddena cettha suññatamukhādīnaṁ gāthāyaṁ avuttānampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a3:28_11: Evaṁ paṭiccasamuppādādimukhehi suttatthassa otaraṇalakkhaṇo otaraṇo hāro nāmāti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:29_4: Idañca pucchantā yebhuyyena gāthābandhavasena pucchantīti katvā vuttaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:29_5: Yamārabbhāti sā pana gāthā yaṁ atthaṁ ārabbha adhikicca pucchitā,
atk-s0519a3:29_9: padañca sodhitaṁ ārambho ca sodhitoti evaṁ padādīnaṁ sodhitāsodhitabhāvavicāro.
atk-s0519a3:29_10: Hāro so sodhanonāmāti yathāvuttavicāro sodhano hāro nāma.
atk-s0519a3:29_11: Evaṁ sutte padapadatthapañhārambhānaṁ sodhanalakkhaṇo “sodhano hāro”ti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:30_11: Te na vikappayitabbāti ye dhammā “dukkhaṁ samudayo”tiādinā sāmaññena,
atk-s0519a3:30_12: “jāti jarā kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā”tiādinā visesena ca sutte desitā,
atk-s0519a3:30_14: ko vā viseso”ti evaṁ sāmaññavisesavikappanavasena na vikappayitabbā. Kasmā?
atk-s0519a3:30_15: Sāmaññavisesakappanāya vohārabhāvena anavaṭṭhānato kāladisāvisesādīnaṁ viya apekkhāsiddhito ca.
atk-s0519a3:30_16: Yathā hi “ajja hiyyo sve”ti vuccamānā kālavisesā anavaṭṭhitasabhāvā “purimā disā pacchimā disā”ti vuccamānā disāvisesā ca,
atk-s0519a3:30_18: Tathā hi “idaṁ dukkha”nti vuccamānaṁ jātiādiapekkhāya sāmaññampi samānaṁ saccāpekkhāya viseso hoti.
atk-s0519a3:30_20: Eso hāro adhiṭṭhānoti evaṁ suttāgatānaṁ dhammānaṁ avikappanavasena sāmaññavisesaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo adhiṭṭhāno hāro nāmāti attho.
atk-s0519a3:31_9: Hetumavakaḍḍhayitvāti taṁ yathāvuttapaccayasaṅkhātaṁ janakādibhedabhinnaṁ hetuṁ ākaḍḍhitvā suttato niddhāretvā yo saṁvaṇṇanāsaṅkhāto,
atk-s0519a3:31_10: eso hāro parikkhāroti evaṁ sutte āgatadhammānaṁ parikkhārasaṅkhāte hetupaccaye niddhāretvā saṁvaṇṇanalakkhaṇo parikkhāro hāroti attho.
atk-s0519a3:32_3: te tesaṁ samādhiādīnaṁ padaṭṭhānabhāvena samāropayitabbāti sambandho.
atk-s0519a3:32_4: Ye cekatthā pakāsitā munināti ye ca rāgavirāgācetovimuttisekkhaphalakāmadhātusamatikkamanādisaddā anāgāmiphalatthatāya
atk-s0519a3:32_7: Samāropanañcettha sutte yathārutavasena niddhāraṇavasena vā gayhamānassa sikkhattayasaṅkhātassa sīlādikkhandhattayassa
atk-s0519a3:32_9: bhāvanāpāripūrī ca pahātabbassa pahānenāti pahānasamāropanāpi atthato dassitā eva hoti.
atk-s0519a3:32_10: Esa samāropano hāroti esa sutte āgatadhammānaṁ padaṭṭhānavevacanabhāvanāpahānasamāropanavicāraṇalakkhaṇo samāropano nāma hāroti attho.
atk-s0519a3:34_1: Evaṁ gāthābandhavasena soḷasapi hāre niddisitvā idāni naye niddisituṁ “taṇhañcā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:34_2: Tattha taṇhañca avijjampi cāti sutte āgataṁ atthato niddhāraṇavasena vā gahitaṁ taṇhaṁ avijjañca yo netīti sambandho.
atk-s0519a3:34_3: Yo saṁvaṇṇanāviseso taṁ neti saṁkilesapakkhaṁ pāpeti saṁkilesavasena suttatthaṁ yojetīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0519a3:34_8: Saccehi yojayitvāti nayanto ca taṇhā ca avijjā ca bhavamūlakattā samudayasaccaṁ,
atk-s0519a3:34_11: tena pattabbā asaṅkhatadhātu nirodhasaccanti evaṁ imehi catūhi saccehi yojetvā.
atk-s0519a3:34_12: Ayaṁ nayo nandiyāvaṭṭoti yo taṇhāvijjāhi saṁkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa samathavipassanāhi vodānapakkhassa
atk-s0519a3:34_15: Ettha ca nayassa bhūmi gāthāyaṁ “nayo”ti vuttā,
atk-s0519a3:34_19: Tassa pana yā ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṁ vasena taṇhādimukhena nayabhūmiracanā,
atk-s0519a3:35_6: Nayanto ca kusalākusalaṁ māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtaṁ na hotīti bhūtaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:35_8: Akusalassa iṭṭhavipākatābhāvato kusalassa ca aniṭṭhavipākatābhāvato vipāke sati avisaṁvādakattā avitathaṁ neti.
atk-s0519a3:35_10: Atha vā akusalamūlehi akusalāni kusalamūlehi ca kusalāni nayanto ayaṁ nayo bhūtaṁ tathaṁ avitathaṁ neti,
atk-s0519a3:35_18: Tipukkhalaṁ taṁ nayaṁ āhūti yo akusalamūlehi saṁkilesapakkhassa kusalamūlehi vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa
atk-s0519a3:36_10: Etaṁ nayanti yo subhasaññādīhi vipallāsehi sakalassa saṁkilesapakkhassa saddhindriyādīhi vodānapakkhassa
atk-s0519a3:36_13: atthanayakusalā eva vā sīhavikkīḷitaṁ nayanti vadantīti attho.
atk-s0519a3:37_1: Veyyākaraṇesūti tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanatthaṁ katesu suttassa atthavissajjanesūti attho.
atk-s0519a3:37_3: Kusalākusalāti vodāniyā saṁkilesikā ca tassa tassa nayassa disābhūtadhammā.
atk-s0519a3:37_5: Manasā volokayateti te yathāvuttadhamme citteneva “ayaṁ paṭhamā disā ayaṁ dutiyā disā”tiādinā tassa tassa nayassa disābhāvena upaparikkhati,
atk-s0519a3:37_11: Taṁ khu disālocanaṁ āhūti olokayateti ettha yadetaṁ olokanaṁ,
atk-s0519a3:38_3: Yena hi vidhinā tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanāya disā olokīyanti,
atk-s0519a3:38_4: so vidhi disālocananti evaṁ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a3:38_12: sammā vā āneti tassa tassa nayassa yojanāvasena.
atk-s0519a3:38_15: Ayaṁ nayoti samānetīti ettha yadetaṁ taṁtaṁnayadisābhūtadhammānaṁ samānayanaṁ,
atk-s0519a3:39_1: Evaṁ hāre naye ca niddisitvā idāni nesaṁ yojanakkamaṁ dassento “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0519a3:41_1: Idāni yesaṁ byañjanapadānaṁ atthapadānañca vasena dvādasa padāni suttanti vuttaṁ,
atk-s0519a3:41_3: Tattha apariyosite pade vaṇṇo akkharaṁ pariyāyavasena akkharaṇato asañcaraṇato.
atk-s0519a3:41_7: Vaṇṇo eva hi ittarakhaṇatāya aparāparabhāvena pavatto padādibhāvena gayhamāno yathāsambandhaṁ taṁ taṁ atthaṁ vadati.
atk-s0519a3:41_9: keci pana “manasā desanāvācāya akkharaṇato akkhara”nti vadanti.
atk-s0519a3:42_1: taṁ nāmapadaṁ ākhyātapadaṁ upasaggapadaṁ nipātapadanti catubbidhaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:42_2: Tattha “phasso vedanā citta”nti evamādikaṁ satvappadhānaṁ nāmapadaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:42_5: Kiriyāya satvassa ca sarūpavisesappakāsanahetubhūtaṁ “eva”nti evamādikaṁ nipātapadaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:43_0: Byañjananti saṅkhepato vuttaṁ padābhihitaṁ atthaṁ byañjayatīti byañjanaṁ, vākyaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:43_2: Padamattasavanepi hi adhikārādivasena labbhamānehi padantarehi anusandhānaṁ katvāva atthasampaṭipatti hotīti vākyameva atthaṁ byañjayati.
atk-s0519a3:44_2: Yadi evaṁ padato ākārassa ko visesoti?
atk-s0519a3:44_3: Apariyosite vākye avibhajjamāne vā tadavayavo padaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:44_4: Uccāraṇavasena pariyosite vākye vibhajjamāne vā tadavayavo ākāroti ayametesaṁ viseso.
atk-s0519a3:44_8: Ettha ca byañjananti imassa padassa anantaraṁ vattabbaṁ ākārapadaṁ niddesapadānantaraṁ vadantena “ākārachaṭṭhavacana”nti vuttaṁ,
atk-s0519a3:44_9: padānupubbikaṁ pana icchantehi taṁ byañjanapadānantarameva kātabbaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:44_10: Tathā hi vakkhati “aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā ākārāti,
atk-s0519a3:44_13: Ettāva byañjanaṁ sabbanti yānimāni akkharādīni niddiṭṭhāni,
atk-s0519a3:44_15: etehi asaṅgahitaṁ byañjanaṁ nāma natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a3:45_4: Iminā hi atthapadadvayena akkharapadehi vibhāviyamāno atthākāro gahito.
atk-s0519a3:45_5: Yasmā akkharehi suyyamānehi suṇantānaṁ visesavidhānassa katattā padapariyosāne padatthasampaṭipatti hoti.
atk-s0519a3:45_6: Tathā hi vakkhati “tattha bhagavā akkharehi saṅkāseti padehi pakāsetīti,
atk-s0519a3:46_1: Vibhajanā ca uttānīkammañca paññatti ca vibhajanuttānīkammapaññatti.
atk-s0519a3:46_4: Idha purimanayeneva byañjanākārehi niddisiyamāno atthākāro dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:46_8: Etthāpi niruttiniddesasaṅkhātehi byañjanapadehi niddisiyamāno atthākāro vutto,
atk-s0519a3:46_10: Etehīti etehi eva saṅkāsanādivinimuttassa desanātthassa abhāvato.
atk-s0519a3:46_13: Suttatthena hi desanāya pavattiyamānena ugghaṭitaññuādiveneyyānaṁ cittasantānassa pabodhanakiriyānibbatti.
atk-s0519a3:47_4: Attho samāyuttoti attho sammā yutto na vinā vattati.
atk-s0519a3:47_5: Sabbassa hi buddhavacanassa catusaccappakāsanato atthanayānañca catusaccayojanavasena pavattanato sabbo
atk-s0519a3:48_1: Idāni yathāniddiṭṭhe desanāhārādike nettippakaraṇassa padatthe sukhaggahaṇatthaṁ gaṇanavasena paricchinditvā dassento “atthassā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0519a3:48_2: Tattha catubbīsāti soḷasa hārā cha byañjanapadāni dve kammanayāti evaṁ catubbīsa.
atk-s0519a3:48_3: Ubhayanti cha atthapadāni tayo atthanayāti idaṁ navavidhaṁ yathāvuttaṁ catubbīsavidhañcāti etaṁ ubhayaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:48_8: ito vinimutto koci nettipadatthā natthīti attho.
atk-s0519a3:49_0: Evaṁ tettiṁsapadatthāya nettiyā suttassa atthapariyesanāya yo “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”nti nayehi paṭhamaṁ
atk-s0519a3:49_3: Evaṁ siddhe sati ayaṁ ārambho imamatthaṁ dīpeti –
atk-s0519a3:49_4: sabbepime hārā nayā ca iminā dassitakkameneva suttesu saṁvaṇṇanāvasena yojetabbā,
atk-s0519a3:50_1: yadete hārā nayā ca imināva kamena desitāti?
atk-s0519a3:50_3: api ca dhammadesanāya nissayaphalatadupāyasarīrabhūtānaṁ assādādīnaṁ vibhāvanasabhāvattā pakatiyā sabbasuttānurūpāti
atk-s0519a3:50_4: suviññeyyabhāvato paresañca saṁvaṇṇanāvisesānaṁ vicayahārādīnaṁ patiṭṭhābhāvato paṭhamaṁ desanāhāro dassito.
atk-s0519a3:51_0: Padapucchāvissajjanapubbāparānugītīhi saddhiṁ desanāhārapadatthānaṁ pavicayasabhāvatāya tassa anantaraṁ vicayo.
atk-s0519a3:52_0: Vicayena hārena pavicitānaṁ atthānaṁ yuttāyuttivicāraṇā yuttāti yuttivicāraṇabhāvato vicayānantaraṁ yuttihāro vutto.
atk-s0519a3:53_0: Yuttāyuttānaṁyeva atthānaṁ upapattianurūpaṁ kāraṇaparamparāya niddhāraṇalakkhaṇaṁ padaṭṭhānacintanaṁ
atk-s0519a3:53_3: “yo koci upanissayo yo koci paccayo ca,
atk-s0519a3:54_0: Yuttāyuttānaṁ kāraṇaparamparāya pariggahitasabhāvānaṁyeva ca dhammānaṁ avuttānampi ekalakkhaṇatāya gahaṇaṁ
atk-s0519a3:54_1: kātabbanti dassanatthaṁ padaṭṭhānānantaraṁ lakkhaṇo hāro vutto.
atk-s0519a3:54_2: Tathā hi lakkhaṇahāravibhaṅge “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā paṭiccasamuppādaṁ dassetvā “evaṁ ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:55_1: na sutte sarūpato āgatānamevāti dassanatthaṁ lakkhaṇānantaraṁ catubyūho vutto.
atk-s0519a3:55_3: evañca katvā “yadā hi bhikkhu atthassa ca nāmaṁ jānāti dhammassa ca nāmaṁ jānāti tathā tathā naṁ abhiniropetī”ti anavasesapariyādānaṁ vakkhati.
atk-s0519a3:55_4: Tathā “punappunaṁ gabbhamupetī”ti ettha “ye jarāmaraṇena aṭṭiyitukāmā bhavissanti,
atk-s0519a3:55_5: te bhavissanti bhojane mattaññuno indriyesu guttadvārā”tiādinā sammāpaṭipattiṁ adhippāyabhāvena vakkhati.
atk-s0519a3:56_0: Nibbacanādhippāyanidānavacanehi saddhiṁ sutte padatthānaṁ suttantarasaṁsandanasaṅkhāte pubbāparavicāre
atk-s0519a3:56_1: dassite tesaṁ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammantarāvaṭṭanaṁ sukhena sakkā dassetunti catubyūhānantaraṁ āvaṭṭo vutto.
atk-s0519a3:56_2: Teneva hi “ārambhatha nikkamathā”ti gāthāyaṁ ārambhanikkamanabuddhasāsanayogadhunanehi vīriyasamādhipaññindriyāni
atk-s0519a3:56_3: niddhāretvā tadanuyogassa mūlaṁ “pamādo”ti suttantare dassito pamādo āvaṭṭito.
atk-s0519a3:57_1: bhūmito ca vibhāgo sakkā sukhena yojitunti āvaṭṭānantaraṁ vibhattihāro vutto.
atk-s0519a3:57_4: nāmasādhāraṇā vatthusādhāraṇā cā”ti ārabhitvā “micchattaniyatānaṁ sattānaṁ aniyatānañca sattānaṁ dassanappahātabbā kilesā sādhāraṇā,
atk-s0519a3:57_5: puthujjanassa sotāpannassa ca kāmarāgabyāpādā sādhāraṇā”tiādinā sabhāgavisabhāgapariyāyavanteyeva dhamme vibhajissati.
atk-s0519a3:58_0: Sāvajjānavajjadhammānaṁ sappaṭibhāgābhāvato tesaṁ vibhāge kate suttāgate dhamme akasirena paṭipakkhato
atk-s0519a3:58_2: Tathā hi “sammādiṭṭhissa purisapuggalassa micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā bhavatī”ti paṭivibhattasabhāve eva dhamme parivattanahāravibhaṅge udāharissati.
atk-s0519a3:59_1: na sutte āgatāyevāti dassanatthaṁ parivattanānantaraṁ vevacanahāro vutto.
atk-s0519a3:60_0: Evaṁ te dhammā pariyāyasaddatopi vibhāvitā hontīti pariyāyato pakāsitānaṁ dhammānaṁ pabhedato paññattivasena
atk-s0519a3:60_1: vibhajanaṁ sukhena sakkā ñātunti vevacanahārānantaraṁ paññattihāro vutto.
atk-s0519a3:60_2: Tathā hi sutte āgatadhammānaṁ pariyāyapaññattivibhāgaṁ subodhanañca paññattihāravibhaṅge vakkhati.
atk-s0519a3:61_1: paṭiccasamuppādādimukhena avadhāraṇaṁ sakkā dassetunti paññattianantaraṁ otaraṇo hāro vutto.
atk-s0519a3:61_2: Tathā hi “uddhaṁ adho”ti gāthaṁ uddisitvā “vippamutto”ti padena asekkhaṁ vijjaṁ niddhāretvā “vijjuppādā
atk-s0519a3:62_0: Dhātāyatanādīsu otāritānaṁ sutte padatthānaṁ pucchārambhavisodhanaṁ sakkā sukhena sampādetunti otaraṇānantaraṁ sodhano hāro vutto.
atk-s0519a3:63_0: Visodhitesu sutte padapadatthesu tattha labbhamānasāmaññavisesabhāvo sukaro hotīti dassetuṁ sodhanānantaraṁ adhiṭṭhāno hāro dassito.
atk-s0519a3:63_2: tato eva hi “yathā yathā vā pana pucchitaṁ,
atk-s0519a3:64_0: Sāmaññavisesabhūtesu sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇesu dhammesu paveditesu parikkhārasaṅkhātassa sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇarūpassa
atk-s0519a3:64_1: paccayaheturāsissa pabhedo suviññeyyoti adhiṭṭhānānantaraṁ parikkhāro vutto.
atk-s0519a3:65_0: Asādhāraṇe sādhāraṇe ca kāraṇe dassite tassa attano phalesu kāraṇākāro tesaṁ hetuphalānaṁ pabhedato desanākāro
atk-s0519a3:65_1: bhāvetabbapahātabbadhammānaṁ bhāvanāpahānāni ca niddhāretvā vuccamānāni sammā suttassa atthaṁ tathattāvabodhāya
atk-s0519a3:66_0: Nayānaṁ pana veneyyattayappayojitattā atthanayattayūpadesassa tadanukkameneva nandiyāvaṭṭādīnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ atthanayānaṁ kamo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a3:66_1: Ugghaṭitaññuādayo hi tayo veneyyā nandiyāvaṭṭādayo payojenti.
atk-s0519a3:66_2: Tasmā te uddesaniddesapaṭiniddesā viya yathākkamaṁ tesaṁ upakārāya savaṁttantīti.
atk-s0519a3:66_3: Tathā hi nesaṁ cattāro cha aṭṭha ca mūlapadā niddiṭṭhā.
atk-s0519a3:66_4: Itarassa pana nayadvayassa atthanayattayassa bhūmiyā ālocanaṁ tassa tattha samānayanañcāti iminā kāraṇena uddesakkamo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a3:67_0: Etaparamatā ca hārānaṁ ettakehi pakāravisesehi atthanayattayasahitehi suttassa attho niddhāriyamāno veneyyānaṁ
atk-s0519a3:67_3: Atha vā etadantogadhattā sabbesaṁ suttassa saṁvaṇṇanāvisesānaṁ ettāvatā hārānaṁ daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a3:68_0: Tathā hi ye keci suttassa saṁvaṇṇanāpakārā niddisīyanti.
atk-s0519a3:68_8: Tathā suttassa payojanaṁ piṇḍattho padattho anusandhi codanā parihāro ca atthaṁ vadantena vattabbāti.
atk-s0519a3:69_0: Tathā tisso kathā ekanāḷikā caturassā nisinnavattikā.
atk-s0519a3:69_1: Tattha pāḷiṁ vatvā ekekapadassa atthakathanaṁ ekanāḷikā nāma.
atk-s0519a3:70_0: Paṭipakkhaṁ dassetvā paṭipakkhassa upamaṁ dassetvā sapakkhaṁ dassetvā sapakkhassa upamaṁ dassetvā kathanaṁ caturassā nāma.
atk-s0519a3:71_0: Visabhāgadhammavaseneva pariyosānaṁ gantvā puna sabhāgadhammavaseneva pariyosānagamanaṁ nisinnavattikā nāma.
atk-s0519a3:72_0: Bhedakathāya tatvakathāya pariyāyavacanehi ca suttaṁ saṁvaṇṇetabbanti ca evamādayo.
atk-s0519a3:73_0: Nayānaṁ pana yasmā ugghaṭitaññuādayo tayo eva veneyyā saccābhisamayabhāgino tadatthāya ca atthanayadesanā,
atk-s0519a3:73_1: tasmā satipi saṁkilesavodānadhammānaṁ yathāvuttamūlapadabhedato vaḍḍhetvā vibhajitabbappakāre tathā mūlapadāni
atk-s0519a3:73_3: Navasu navasu eva hi mūlapadesu sabbesaṁ saṁkilesavodānadhammānaṁ antogadhabhāvato na tāni vaḍḍhetabbāni
atk-s0519a3:73_4: veneyyattayādhikārato na hāpetabbānīti nayānaṁ etaparamatā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a3:74_0: Kammanayānaṁ pana ālocanasamānayanato aññassa pakārantarassa asambhavato etaparamatā.
atk-s0519a3:74_8: Paccayadhammo kusalo akusalo saddo ariyamaggoti pañcavidho.
atk-s0519a3:74_9: Tathā sabhāgahetu asabhāgahetu ajjhattikahetu bāhirahetu janakahetu pariggāhakahetu sādhāraṇahetu asādhāraṇahetu
atk-s0519a3:74_10: samanantarahetu paramparahetu sahajātahetu asahajātahetu sāsavahetu anāsavahetūtiādinā anekavidho cāti
atk-s0519a3:75_1: Adhigantabbatopi sampāpakahetuvasena phalapariyāyo labbhatīti nibbattetabbaadhigantabbabhāvato duvidhaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:76_0: Bhūmīti sāsavabhūmi anāsavabhūmi saṅkhatabhūmi asaṅkhatabhūmi dassanabhūmi bhāvanābhūmi puthujjanabhūmi
atk-s0519a3:76_1: sekkhabhūmi asekkhabhūmi sāvakabhūmi paccekabuddhabhūmi sammāsambuddhabhūmi jhānabhūmi asamāhitabhūmi
atk-s0519a3:76_2: paṭipajjamānabhūmi paṭipannabhūmi paṭhamābhūmi yāva catutthībhūmi kāmāvacarabhūmi yāva lokuttarabhūmīti
atk-s0519a3:76_11: Sekkhabhūmi cattāro ariyamaggadhammā heṭṭhimā ca tayo phaladhammā.
atk-s0519a3:76_18: Paṭhamādibhūmiyo saha phalena cattāro maggā apariyāpannā dhammā “paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā”tiādivacanato.
atk-s0519a3:76_20: Ye ca dhammā tesaṁ tesaṁ hāranayānaṁ patiṭṭhānabhāvena suttesu niddhārīyanti,
atk-s0519a3:77_2: Yañca sandhāya sutte “dukkhūpanisā saddhā saddhūpanisaṁ ‘sīla’nti yāva vimuttūpanisaṁ vimuttiñāṇadassana”nti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:77_3: Api ca upanisāti tasmiṁ tasmiṁ samaye siddhante hadayabhūtaṁ abbhantaraṁ vuccati.
atk-s0519a3:77_5: yaṁ sammā pariggaṇhantā dhammakathikā tasmiṁ tasmiṁ sutte āgatadhammamukhena sabbahāranayayojanāya samatthā honti.
atk-s0519a3:78_5: ayañca attho desanāhāravicayahāraniddesavaṇṇanāyaṁ vitthārato pakāsito eva.
atk-s0519a3:79_0: Sabhāgavisabhāgadhammā ca tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ anukūlapaṭikūladhammā yathākkamaṁ veditabbā. Yathā –
atk-s0519a3:79_2: micchāsaṅkappo visabhāgoti iminā nayena sabbaṁ sabhāgavisabhāgato veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0519a3:80_0: Lakkhaṇanti sabhāvo. So hāranayānaṁ niddese vibhāvito eva.
atk-s0519a3:81_0: Yaṁ panetaṁ hetuādivisesavinimuttaṁ hāranayānaṁ yojanānibandhanaṁ, so nayo. Yathāha –
atk-s0519a3:81_1: lakkhaṇahāre “evaṁ ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā kiccato ca lakkhaṇato ca sāmaññato cā”tiādi.
atk-s0519a3:81_2: Tathā vicayena hārena vicinitvā yuttihārena yojetabbāti.
atk-s0519a3:82_0: Evaṁ hetuphalādīni upadhāretvā nesaṁ vasena tattha tattha sutte labbhamānapadatthaniddhāraṇamukhena yathālakkhaṇaṁ ete hārā nayā ca yojetabbā.
atk-s0519a3:84_0: Ettāvatā ca hetvādī, veditabbā hi viññunā”ti.
